sentences.en: Children will play wherever they happen to be.
sentences.cn: 小孩子走到哪里玩到哪里。

sentences.en: He would keep in touch with us wherever he was .
sentences.cn: 他无论在什么地方，总是与我们保持联系。

sentences.en: it is bound to have originated in Taiwan or wherever.
sentences.cn: 它一定起源于台湾或别的什么地方。

sentences.en: Jack believed in finding happiness wherever possible.
sentences.cn: 杰克认为应该及时行乐。

sentences.en: Opera houses are packed out wherever she sings.
sentences.cn: 每逢她演唱，任何歌剧院都场场爆满。

sentences.en: She has to have an armed bodyguard wherever she goes.
sentences.cn: 她不管到哪儿都得有带武器的保镖跟从.

sentences.en: She used to follow after him wherever he went.
sentences.cn: 以前,他走到哪里,她总是跟到哪里.

sentences.en: She'llwear fine jewellery wherever she goes.
sentences.cn: 无论到哪儿她都会佩戴精美的首饰。

sentences.en: Sit wherever you like.
sentences.cn: 你爱坐在哪儿就坐哪儿。

sentences.en: Start now, from wherever you are. Do that, and trust me, the resources will show up.
sentences.cn: 从现在开始，无论你在那里，照上面的做，相信我，丰富的资源即将展现。

sentences.en: The foolish boy was laughed at wherever he went.
sentences.cn: 这个愚蠢的男孩不论走到哪里都受到讥笑.

sentences.en: The paparazzi pursue Armani wherever he travels.
sentences.cn: 阿玛尼走到哪儿，狗仔队就跟到哪儿。

sentences.en: The people's army put all to rout wherever they went.
sentences.cn: 人民军队所向披靡.

sentences.en: The young princess was chaperoned wherever she went.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻的公主无论到什么地方去都由人陪送。

sentences.en: They agreed to work co-operatively to ease tensions wherever possible.
sentences.cn: 他们同意互相配合尽一切努力缓解紧张局势。

sentences.en: We have sworn to fight cruelty wherever we find it.
sentences.cn: 我们发誓要见恶除恶。

sentences.en: Wherever have you been?
sentences.cn: 你究竟去哪里了？

sentences.en: Wherever he goes there's always a flap.
sentences.cn: 无论他到哪里，都会引起一阵骚动。

sentences.en: Wherever he goes, a carload of soldiers goes with him.
sentences.cn: 不管他去哪里，总有一车士兵跟着。

sentences.en: Wherever they went they were closely followed by security men.
sentences.cn: 不管上哪儿，保安人员都紧跟在他们身后。

words.tran_cn: 无论在哪里；无论什么情况下

phrases.tran_cn: 无论你在哪儿；无论你身在何处

trans.tran_en: to or at any place, position, or situation

trans.tran_cn: 无论哪里，各处，在所有…的情况下
